nodes.documentation:
The Vault contract has an owner who is able to set the manager. The manager is
able to perform withdrawals.
nodes.name: Vault

nodes.documentation: Modifies a function to run only when called by `manager`.
nodes.name: onlyManager

nodes.documentation: Withdraw `amount` of `token` to address `to`. Only callable by `manager`.
nodes.name: withdrawTo

nodes.documentation:
The Vault contract has an owner who is able to set the manager. The manager is
able to perform withdrawals.
nodes.name: Vault

nodes.documentation: Modifies a function to run only when called by `manager`.
nodes.name: onlyManager

nodes.documentation: Withdraw `amount` of `token` to address `to`. Only callable by `manager`.
nodes.name: withdrawTo

nominateNewOwner(address).details: Nominates a new owner `newOwner`. Requires a follow-up `acceptOwnership`. Can only be called by the current owner.

nominatedOwner().details: Returns the address of the current nominated owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership(string).notice: Set `_owner` to the 0 address. Only do this to deliberately lock in the current permissions.     * THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE! Call this only if you know what you're doing and why you're doing it!

withdrawTo(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdraw `amount` of `token` to address `to`. Only callable by `manager`.

userdoc.notice: The Vault contract has an owner who is able to set the manager. The manager is able to perform withdrawals.
